com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt

Class GuiSwtFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.GuiSwtFactory

  • public class GuiSwtFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating an SWT-specific ViewFactory adapting between SWT and Acrolinx GUI SDK objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createViewFactory

        public ViewFactory createViewFactory(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parent)
        Returns:
        a new ViewFactory which can be used for creating a GuiCheckController using GuiFactory

      • createSelectionListenerAdapter

        public org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener createSelectionListenerAdapter(ClickHandler clickHandler)
        Returns:
        a SelectionListener adapting to the given ClickHandler that is used for manually iterating over command list GuiController.createMainMenuCommands() or GuiController.createToolbarCommands().

      • createMenuAdapter

        public MenuPresenter.MenuView createMenuAdapter(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Menu menu)
        Returns:
        a MenuPresenter.MenuView adapting to the given menu used by GuiController.presentMainMenu(MenuView)

      • createToolbarAdapter

        public MenuPresenter.MenuView createToolbarAdapter(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.ToolBar toolbar)

        a MenuPresenter.MenuView adapting to the given toolbar used by GuiController.presentToolbar(MenuView)
